P010164.project_name: Industrial Development Bank of Pakistan Project (02)

project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide long-term foreign currency financing to the private sector for carrying out small and medium-sized industrial projects. It would also assist in overall institutional and financial improvements in IDBP.
